issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

this one is bizarre.

code is in ticket:
http://helpdesk.appcelerator.net/tickets/2151

just click on text, close window and repeat and the app will consistently crash on the simulator

{html}
fields.summary: App crashes after repeated open/close of window

comments.body:
{html}

(from [ada8cab763537160ed6498c447e9a0d24640bc51]) Closes #838 . Moved locking of a view's children array into a readwrite lock, and moved add and remove actions to happen on the main thread to avoid deadlocking with same. Should be faster and safer. http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/ada8cab763537...

{html}
